channel.title: Deadhost Investigation on fiskeren.github.io

item.title: Deadhost Investigation and Super Timeline
item.description:
I recently attended a SANS 508 course and got time to play around with Velociraptor, which is an awesome DFIR tool made to efficiently get visibility into endpoints. It can be run in a server/agent setup, essentially working as an EDR with thousands of hosts, and it can also be used as a standalone artifact collector.

In this post, I’ll try to explain how to use the Velociraptor executable as a artefact collector to quickly collect Windows artefacts from a dead host image. After collecting the artefacts, I will show how to create a super timeline using Plaso log2timeline from the evidence collected.
